Perceptor:

"Be ready, I'll retire the stasis, let's see how good this prog=
ram worked"said the blind predacon"Get something to move her to Medical bay=
, after the stasis is removed we will have a while " then he opened his com=
link and  said to Hydras "Lord Hydras, she will wake up soon "

"I'm headin=
g there " said the Predacpmn lord


From: airly2002@... 
Sent: Frid=
ay, March 05, 2010 4:42 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recover=
ing Rodimus/BlackFortress


  

Perceptor:

"Determine the best option for =
her"say drily the male "Now her weapons and beast mode are removed, Hydras =
wont like that she leave the base, so her fuction will be more... she wont =
be a warrior but she will helpful after all, i was thinking to remove her m=
emories and neutralize het maximal program; with those factors off her cons=
ious mind, she will start again... She will learn whatever we treach her...=
 This will be for her a new beginning, we are jsut recreating her awakening=
 and testing one of several teories that I have"said Perceptor while he sta=
rted to downlad a program"As soon as this program is finished, she will wak=
e up... Just think this Rodimus, this is less agressive than a reprogramati=
on and more or less same effects; also her signature will be modified and w=
ith the time if all is alright she will get a new beast form and a big impr=
ovement in her weapons... she will become a true warrior not a mere scout".=





From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Friday, March 05, 2010 5:44 AM
To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  

Rodim=
us nodded as he waited for Perceptor to do whatever it is he was
going to d=
o. To make her a Predacon, yes that 'felt' like the right
thing to do. So w=
hy was he he so nervous about it? It was as if there
was something inside o=
f him screaming at him to stop all of this, but
he couldn't hear it.

Rodim=
us just crossed his arms over his chest as he watched the pod
slowly start =
to move, the locks disengaged and the Pod's door opened,
revealing a sleepi=
ng Nightlight.

Rodimus' optics took in the sight - Her wrists and ankles, =
they were
still tied up to the pod. He shook his head again, this time in
s=
urprise. Nightlight looked so different, so thin and pale. Her her
beast ha=
d been removed and she definitely looked more humanoid.

"She looks . . . u=
ndamaged." Rodimus said, his voice quiet and
subdued. With her laying there=
 like that, shackled and stripped of her
beast mode, she looked so vulnerab=
le.

"What are you going to do?" Rodimus asked, his voice still quiet and c=
urious.

(TAG)

Preston
(Rodimus)
